Sentence: Blore, Lombard, and Armstrong decide that the deaths must have been murders and determine to scour the island in search of the mysterious Mr
Blore, Lombard, and Armstrong run to help her (Vera), only to return downstairs to find Wargrave draped in a curtain that resembles courtroom robes and bearing a red mark on his (Armstrong) forehead
That night, Blore hears footsteps in the hall; upon checking, he (Armstrong) finds that Armstrong is not in his (Armstrong) room
Blore and Lombard search for Armstrong, but they cannot find him (Armstrong) anywhere in the house or on the island
